location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 10/14 [10/25] BAPCO'S WORKING OF ZELLAQ SALT DEPOSIT'

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order. There is an index at the end of the file (folio 6). The index is arranged chronologically and refers to documents within the file; it gives brief description of the correspondence with a reference number which refers back to that correspondence in the file.
The foliation is written in pencil, in the top right corner. It begins on the cover, on number 1, and runs through to 7, on the inside of the back cover of the file.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited, the Political Agent at Bahrain and the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain on the rights for extracting salt from Zellaq, Bahrain, for the purpose of softening water.There is an index at the end of the volume (folio 6).

name.namePart: Adviser to the Government of Bahrain
Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
Shaikh Hakim of Bahrain Ḥamad bin 'Īsá Āl Khalīfah
Shaikh Hakim of Bahrain Salmān bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah
King of Saudi Arabia Sa'ūd bin 'Abd al-'Azīz Āl Sa'ūd
